title: My prepaid card doesnt working
body:
We apologize, but the store is unable to process your payment at this time. Please wait a few minutes and try again. If this problem persists, please contact us at http://support.leagueoflegends.com/.

This Show up everytime when i try to eneter my code.Then i tried later same thing

replies.body: We'd like to help out with your specific issue individually!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can look into this.  We'll respond asap!
